name: Cheap surf
description:
Whether you are a water sport enthusiast like kayaking, skim boarding and surfing or just simply want to bum at the beach, this is the trip for you.

I always say that if you are in to traveling you should learn how to travel in the most inexpensive way to save up for your next trip. And this is basically what I wanted to impose on this trip.

Although Philippines is surrounded by body of water, Manila is still a City in the middle of this tiny republic island. Yes there's so much to see around the City but if you are up to more nature like experience with just less time to spare or spend you definitely can!
